page.title: 17GOXHILL PLAYING FIELD.
page.content: The Playing Field is next to the school at North End. It is a long narrow strip of land just over the width of a football pitch. In its length two football pitches could be fitted. The narrow entry to the field is from the car park outside the school's gates. The field has had a football pitch and a children's slide, witch's hat, climbing frame, swings and rocking horse on it. The Goxhill Playing Fields Association has recently been formed and they are using the Barton Community Programme Scheme workers to put in a BMX Fun Track near the entry to the field. This is incomplete but so far loads of earth have been brought in; the turf removed from the field for the track; upright tyres put in to the ground to make the edges of the first part of the track.
